Constructor Detail

IsoscelesTriangle

protected IsoscelesTriangle()

IsoscelesTriangle

public IsoscelesTriangle(float cx,
                         float cy,
                         float width,
                         float height)
Generates vertical isosceles triangle.

Parameters:
cx - - middle point of triangle's base side. X coordinate.
cy - - middle point of triangle's base side. Y coordinate.
width - - base side length;
height - - length of the height from top point to base side.
